original_text: But Joshua kept Rahab safe, as well as her family and everyone who belonged to her. Rahab had hidden the men that Joshua sent to find out about Jericho city. Because she did that, her family still lives among the Israelites, even today.
korean_text: 여호수아가 기생 라합과 그의 아버지의 가족과 그에게 속한 모든 것을 살렸으므로 그가 오늘까지 이스라엘 중에 거주하였으니 이는 여호수아가 여리고를 정탐하려고 보낸 사자들을 숨겼음이었더라

sentences.original_text: and everyone who belonged to her
that Joshua sent to find out about Jericho city
sentences.korean_translation: 여호수아가 여리고 성에 대해 알아보려고 보낸

sentences.original_text: her family still lives among the Israelites
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 가족은 이스라엘 사람들 중에 여전히 살고 있습니다
